column4: Anyone know how I would bridge my eth0/1 with my ra0 on 10.04? Everytime I bring the bridge up it knocks my Wireless out.
just FYI (if it applies) but as noted on this page, most wireless don't support bridging - good luck.  https://help.ubuntu.com/community/KVM/Networking
thanks for the link. I guess I'm screwed trying to connect my 360 to the internet when my router is downstairs, eh?
